"... I can finally come here now.": "I'm sorry for not being able to visit until now..."
"Everyone from Aelio Town..."
"Garoa..."
"I've known about this place since the beginning."
"But, when you two decided to make this, I wasn't able to respond to Aina's call..."
"I was afraid... of confronting reality."
"Though, even now it feels like I'm... not totally confronting it head-on..."
"Garoa used to say things like \"Take care of Aina for me\" to me all the time."
"In those days, I doubt it had that deep of a meaning to it."
"After all, out of everyone in Aelio town, I was the closest to Aina in terms of age."
"He probably meant for me to be like her caring big sister."
"But now, those words are so... heavy."
"\"I'm entrusting Aina to you.\""
"... That's what those words feel like."
"I'm going to be looking out for her too."
"Manon, you are Aina's big sister."
"Thanks. It's relieving to hear you say that."
"Does it really... look that way?"
"If it does, that's a bit of a relief."
"Aina's gotten much stronger, you know. Both in body and mind."
"She's overcome her grief, has been moving forward ever since."
"That's why I have to move forward as well."
"I have to overcome my own immaturity, for Aina's sake as well."
"That's why I've come here today."
"To make a promise to Garoa... to everyone... And a promise to you."
"I swear to protect Aina, no matter what."
"That's the only thing I can do for them."
